name: LoveChoice 拣爱
description: Do you know what love is? This game is trying to give our answer. This game encourages people to have a sensitive and gentle heart. Enjoy!
minimum_requirements: Betriebssystem: Windows 7 or above Prozessor: 2GHz or above Arbeitsspeicher: 4 GB RAM Grafik: Which supports DirectX9 or DirectX11 Speicherplatz: 300 MB verfügbarer Speicherplatz Zusätzliche Anmerkungen: Please use mouse with the wheel
